name: CICD | FUNC | (MS Teams) Save Project Configuration
description: When there is a new command to Slack Workbot, do action and other actions

code.name: execute

input.sample_document:
{
	"project_config_id": "sample project config id",
    "deployment_mode": "rlcm",
	"source_environment": "TEST",
	"source_code_repo": "source code repo",
	"source_code_reviewer": "reviewer uname",
	"reviewer_msteams": "msteams user",
	"release_announcement": "announcement channel",
  	"project_name": "project name",
	"manifest_id": "132432",
  	"source_project_folder": "132432",
	"project_dependencies": "9b592f7a-b752-4fac-b38e-e0a64c3832c2,96103bce-7fcf-459f-80b6-b0c4c610daab",
	"target_env_folder_1": "1111",
    "target_env_1": "DEV",
    "target_env_folder_2": "2222",
    "target_env_2": "TEST",
    "pm_project_key":"sample key"
}
